items.title: More details on ChromeOS's planned phase out emerge
items.summary: Google is preparing a shakeup of its operating system landscape and ChromeOS is getting the short end of the stick. items.title: Mouat and Dodds get Team GB off to winning start
items.summary: Bruce Mouat and Jen Dodds overcome a power cut and the loss of the first end to get Team GB's Winter Olympics off to a winning start in the mixed doubles curling against Norway.

items.title: I don't have to throw tables - Chisora on facing Wilder

items.title: Pixel 10a official render leaks
items.summary: The Pixel 10a is nearing its launch, and we've got yet another look at the phone. The few press renders come courtesy of Evan Blass and seemingly show the Pixel 10a in Lavender, one of the new colors. As a reminder, solid leaks suggest that the Pixel 10a will come in Lavender, Obsidian, Berry, and â€¦

items.summary: Last year at the MWC, we got some hands-on time with a curious prototype â€“ the Xiaomi Modular Optical System. Xiaomi described it as a research project, so its future was uncertain. However, Digital Chat Station now reports that this device is going into mass production and will be available commerâ€¦

items.title: 'The rebuild of myself' - Wilder opens up on mental health struggles
items.summary: Former world heavyweight champion Deontay Wilder opens up about his mental health struggles, and says he's now "at peace" before his fight against Derek Chisora on 4 April at London's O2 Arena.

items.title: OpenClaw’s AI ‘skill’ extensions are a security nightmare
items.summary: OpenClaw, the AI agent that has exploded in popularity over the past week, is raising new security concerns after researchers uncovered malware in hundreds of user-submitted "skill" add-ons on its marketplace. In a post on Monday, 1Password product VP Jason Meller says OpenClaw's skill hub has becoâ€¦

items.title: 'Taylor is best' - Littler plays down Humphries' 'greatest-ever' compliment
items.summary: Reigning world champion Luke Littler says Phil Taylor is the greatest darts player of all-time after being branded the best ever by Luke Humphries.

items.title: The best iPad deals you can get right now
items.summary: While the best iPad deals usually land during major sale events like Black Friday, many great iPad deals are available outside of those times. The day-to-day discounts come and go like changing winds, so thereâ€™s often some amount to be saved, particularly on Appleâ€™s most affordable iPad, the iPad Mâ€¦

items.title: Briton Kavanagh steps in to face Moreno at UFC Mexico
items.summary: Briton Lone'er Kavanagh steps in at less than a month's notice to fight Brandon Moreno in Mexico on 28 February.

items.title: vivo V70 Elite runs Geekbench confirming its first-in-line chipset
items.summary: The vivo V70 Elite has purportedly been spotted in the Geekbench online database today with the model number V2548. The prototype in question had 12GB of RAM, and ran Android 16. The V70 Elite is powered by the Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 SoC, which is rather significant since this will be the first vivo Vâ€¦
